HERO.SUBTITLE: I transform complex ideas into powerful and intelligent web applications. Specialized in Angular, Spring Boot, and AI integration.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.P1: A passionate developer with a strong background in software engineering and a love for creating efficient, scalable web solutions. My goal is to turn a vision into technical reality, with a special focus on code quality and user experience.
ABOUT.P2: From robust backend development with Spring Boot to creating dynamic user interfaces with Angular, I master the entire development lifecycle. My DevOps skills enable me to ensure smooth deployment and efficient continuous integration.

SKILLS.TITLE: My Technical Arsenal
SKILLS.SUBTITLE: From design to production, here are the tools and methodologies I use to transform an idea into a robust and powerful application. Click to learn more.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Angular
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I create reactive and complex user interfaces with Angular. Deep mastery of reusable components, state management (RxJS), lazy loading for optimization, and reactive forms.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Spring Boot
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I build solid and secure backends with Spring Boot. Expert in creating RESTful APIs, integrating Spring Data JPA for data access, and implementing authentication/authorization with Spring Security (JWT).

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Git & GitHub
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I use Git and GitHub daily for code versioning, team collaboration (Pull Requests, Code Reviews), and as the cornerstone of Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to Netlify and Render.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Docker
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I containerize applications to ensure identical development and production environments, thus eliminating compatibility issues. I write optimized Dockerfiles for fast builds and lightweight images.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Netlify & Render
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Hands-on experience deploying modern full-stack applications. I leverage Netlify for continuous deployment of the Angular frontend (branch deploys, rollbacks) and Render for hosting the Spring Boot backend and PostgreSQL databases.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Agile Scrum Method
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I work efficiently within agile teams. Accustomed to the Scrum lifecycle: sprints, daily stand-ups, sprint planning, and retrospectives, allowing me to deliver value iteratively and quickly.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: UML & Analysis
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Before writing a single line of code, I model complex solutions with UML (class diagrams, sequence diagrams) using tools like Astah to ensure a coherent and scalable software architecture.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: Java
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: My language of choice for the backend. Mastery of advanced OOP concepts, Design Patterns, and the Java ecosystem to build high-performance business logic within Spring.

SKILLS_DATA.NAME: PostgreSQL
SKILLS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: I design optimized relational databases. Proficient in writing high-performance SQL queries, managing transactions, and using PostgreSQL as a reliable data foundation for my applications.

PROJECTS.TITLE: My Project Portfolio
PROJECTS.SUBTITLE: Each project is a story, a solution to a problem. Explore my work to see my expertise in action. Filter by technology to find what interests you.

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: Educamer - E-learning Platform
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A complete online learning solution designed to connect tutors, instructors, students, and parents. The application manages distinct user roles with specific permissions, course hosting, and progress tracking.
POINTS_FORTS: Decoupled Deployment: Frontend on Netlify and Backend on Render.
Robust JWT-based authentication with Spring Security.
Architecture designed for scalability and ease of maintenance.

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: E-commerce Platform "SmartShop"
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A complete e-commerce application with user management, product catalog, cart, and secure Stripe payment integration. The architecture is based on microservices and a robust RESTful API.

PROJECTS_DATA.TITLE: Monitoring Dashboard "InfraView"
PROJECTS_DATA.DESCRIPTION: A real-time dashboard for monitoring server status. Data is pushed from the backend to the client via WebSockets for minimal latency. The entire system is containerized with Docker and deployed on AWS.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's Discuss Your Project
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: I am passionate about creating innovative solutions and am always open to new opportunities. Whether you have a question or a concrete proposal, feel free to reach out.
